effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, causing an Upheveal at 100% effectiveness that does not knock enemies up. Casting Breath of Eons always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: Your Upheavals have a 50% chance to grant Essence Burst. Eruptions cast with Essence Burst deal 25% increased damage.
Set: Upheaval deals 30% increased damage and increases the damage of your next 2 Eruption casts by 30%.
(4) Set: Ebon Might increases primary stats by an additional 0.4% of your own every 2 sec it remains active, up to 2.0%.

(4) Set: Your Upheavals have a 50% chance to grant Essence Burst. Eruptions cast with Essence Burst deal 25% increased damage.

(4) Set: Ebon Might increases primary stats by an additional 0.4% of your own every 2 sec it remains active, up to 2.0%.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,241 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 93,687 Nature damage over 8 sec.
Equip: Your spells have a chance to inspire you to experiment on an ally, enhancing them in unforeseen ways for 20 sec.

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.
